author: Ted Litchfield
description: Stop, please, you're making us blush.
title: Ryu Ga Gotoku boss credits PC gamers' love of Yakuza 0 with taking the series worldwide: 'I truly believe we are where we are today because of them'

author: Ted Litchfield
description: The route looks like a controller-snapping good time.
title: It's possible to get Silksong's double jump in Act 1 well before you're supposed to, you just have to be enough of a platforming god to prove you don't need it

author: Stevie Bonifield
description: The ROG Xbox Ally X is pricey enough as it is without paying a scalper double.
title: Scalpers are already selling the promise of an Asus ROG Xbox Ally X for over $2,000 when it's still available for pre-order at half the price

author: Ted Litchfield
description: Maybe the next one will sell better if it's on PC from the jump.
title: After stumbling out of the gate with poor sales as a PS5 exclusive, Final Fantasy 7: Rebirth director says it's 'doing very well on both PS5 and PC,' while 'a lot of the content is already playable' in the upcoming third game

author: Ted Litchfield
description: The way it was meant to be played?
title: There's a Silksong mod to double every boss in the game, in case it was getting too easy

author: Stevie Bonifield
description: Ahead of its early access release, 2XKO's director warns players it might not be perfect.
title: 'Something we try might go wrong or it might not be good, but we'll address it': 2XKO director promises the team is committed to the new League of Legends fighting game

author: Stevie Bonifield
description: The Forza Horizon 5 Hot Wheels DLC was the practice run for Horizon 6.
title: 'The team wanted to present more than a postcard or a backdrop': Forza Horizon 6 devs credit road trips and Hot Wheels DLC for upcoming racer

author: Issy van der Velde
description: Every. Single. Thing.
title: Every game, trailer, and announcement in the PC Gaming Show Tokyo Direct

author: Issy van der Velde
description: The walls have eyes. Everything has eyes. The eyes might have eyes.
title: Don't Lie is a freaky new horror game about a reclusive 'hikikomori' trapped in liminal spaces with terrifying hallucinations and so very many eyes

author: Issy van der Velde
description: The studio behind this new party game includes former Fall Guys and Gang Beasts developers.
title: New party game Task Time promises 'unlimited chaos' with over 500,000 task variations and the instruction to 'do what it takes' to win

author: Justin Wagner
description: The dark fantasy beat 'em up should make for a stellar soundscape.
title: Absolum's newest trailer teases killer music from the composer behind Elden Ring and Sekiro

author: Issy van der Velde
description: I'll be so sad if anything bad happens to these foxes.
title: Will you lead your foxfolk to war or peace in 4X kingdom builder Raev: Kingdom on the Distant Shores?

author: Issy van der Velde
description: Kill it with fire.
title: Huntsman is like Alien: Isolation but with massive spiders instead of Xenomorphs, and its demo is coming next month

author: Justin Wagner
description: Can't pick a character? Just swap mid-combo.
title: Don't lie: You've always wanted to be a djent-fueled shapeshifting robot samurai, and Morbid Metal's imminent playtest will finally deliver the goods

author: Issy van der Velde
description: Isn't Oku great? Isn't it so beautiful? This is a haiku.
title: Oku lets you live out life as a serene wandering poet who helps talking cats, tea ladies, and disgruntled fishermen

author: Issy van der Velde
description: But how perfect is paradise, really?
title: D-topia is about a city where 'life is curated by artificial intelligence to maximize happiness,' which actually sounds like something the tech industry is on the verge of pitching

author: Issy van der Velde
description: Blend genres in rhythmic battles.
title: Create your band in People of Note, a turn-based RPG musical that feels like the Kpop Demon Hunters tie-in game I wished for

author: Issy van der Velde
description: Stunning vistas and dangerous dungeons.
title: Demi and the Fractured Dream brings a Zelda-like action adventure game to PC with stylish combat and mysterious characters

author: Issy van der Velde
description: Who's a good boy?
title: House Flipper 2 brings back the pets in an upcoming DLC that will add dozens of cats and dogs as well as hamster, bunnies, snakes, and a bunch of other cute critters to adopt

author: Issy van der Velde
description: You're only as good as your preparation.
title: Outward 2 opts for immersion over power fantasy, but the RPG gives you all the tools you need to survive in its harsh world

author: Justin Wagner
description: Ancient secrets, arcane archery, and oodles of first person platforming awaits.
title: Reach combines the best of Mirror's Edge and Prince of Persia in a sleek VR package

author: Issy van der Velde
description: Soulmask will hit 1.0 later this year.
title: Soulmask, the survival game that's basically Palworld but with people, is finally leaving early access, and it's coming with an ancient Egyptian DLC

author: Justin Wagner
description: Creative director Jan Theysen and senior game designer Elliott Verbiest explain how the sequel's inspirations affected what went into it.
title: Dawn of War 4's 'guiding star' was the first in the series, but 'you're not trying to recreate the old game, you try to recreate the feeling'

author: Justin Wagner
description: Threads of Time wears its inspirations proudly on its sleeve.
title: If the average JRPG moves too slowly for you, keep an eye on Threads of Time, which gets through 12 million years and an apocalypse in one campaign

author: Christopher Livingston
description: Keep your followers content as the world comes to an end in this comedic take on the survival genre.
title: In co-op open world survival game Join Us, you run a doomsday cult whose belief system is like 'a dynamic skill tree that evolves as the game goes on'

author: Justin Wagner
description: It's the end of the world as we know it. You just know it a little earlier than everyone else.
title: 'Planet Earth is about to be recycled': Join Us is a multiplayer game about leading a cult into doomsday and, apparently, riding grizzly bears

author: Justin Wagner
description: In tile-based autobattler Turnbound, you're up against the "trapped souls" of other players.
title: When you lose in this 'haunted board game', your builds become opponents for other players to fight asynchronously

author: Issy van der Velde
description: What if I just unplug my keyboard, what then?
title: 'Liars must be punished': Dyping Escape looks creepy as hell, pitting you against a pair of eyes that seem to be taking over your PC

author: Issy van der Velde
description: Swim through the past.
title: Descend into the murky depths of memory in Mind Diver, a trippy puzzle game set in an ocean of remembrance

author: Issy van der Velde
description: Everything you need to overcome these challenges is already within you.
title: MotionRec is a puzzle platformer where you can record your movements and then play them back

author: Issy van der Velde
description: Just tell me where to get those daggers and jumping skills.
title: Stylish combat, tragic bosses, and a world inspired by Asian folklore combine to make The Relic: First Guardian one of the most exciting upcoming action RPGs

author: Issy van der Velde
description: Are you ready to descend into the abyss?
title: Doomspire combines lots of my favorite things: deck builders, roguelikes, and fantasy, and it's out now

author: Issy van der Velde
description: Look at the adorable bunny ears on that robot.
title: Farmbotic mashes up Stardew Valley and Satisfactory in a cross-platform farming sim where little robot buddies help grow your crops

author: Issy van der Velde
description: I can't wait to get my hands on that quadruple-barrelled shotgun.
title: Killing Floor 3's Rearmament update drops this Halloween, bringing new weapons, a revamped perk system, and loads of bug fixes and performance improvements

author: Justin Wagner
description: What do punk cats listen to, anyway? The Rameownes? Con-purr-ge?
title: Cyberpunk roguelike Clawpunk's new trailer has a release date and more chainsaw cats than any other game I've seen, well, probably ever

author: Justin Wagner
description: Mars Tactics will be out in May 2026 with turn-based tactics, squad management, and interplanetary labor politics.
title: If humans ever live on Mars, will they 'bend the knee to Earth's institutions' or turn the Red Planet even redder? Mars Tactics puts the answer in your hands next year

author: Issy van der Velde
description: I doubt that hotel has a good hygiene rating.
title: Hotel Barcelona's 'hardcore spirit' is inspired by the tough action games creator Swery65 worked on at the start of his career

author: Issy van der Velde
description: Perfect for gamers who are happy to get their hands dirty
title: Kaiju Cleanup sees you mopping up monsters from the inside out in a satirical blend of PowerWash Simulator and Hardspace: Shipbreaker

author: Issy van der Velde
description: Danger is everywhere in this game.
title: Extraction shooter Gravebound's bullet hell action adds an exciting twist to the genre, and you can try it out in an open play test right now

author: Justin Wagner
description: You won't believe how many part-time jobs this raccoon dog has.
title: BMX delivery, sumo-wrestling, fishing: Cozy gaming gets a little Crazy Taxi, as a treat, in Tanuki: Pon's Summer

author: Issy van der Velde
description: Masayoshi Yokoyama talks us through some of the big changes coming in Yakuza Kiwami 3 and Dark Ties.
title: Yakuza Kiwami 3 has 'completely revamped' action that lets you you fight with Ryukyu weapons and ninjas inspired by the Okinawa setting

author: Rick Lane
description: Bully? Pulp it.
title: Bully 2 never happened due to 'bandwidth issues' according to Rockstar co-founder Dan Houser: 'You just can't do all the projects you want'

author: Issy van der Velde
description: A 3D platformer that brings back the joy of those childhood classics.
title: A singing axolotl and a magical bunny team up in Billie Bust Up, a retro platformer with rhythmic boss battles and witchy movement abilities

author: Justin Wagner
description: Somewhere between classic Zelda and Human Fall Flat, you'll find self-billed "dungeon brawler" Awaysis.
title: I'm convinced dungeon crawlers have always needed skiing physics after Awaysis' newest trailer

author: Issy van der Velde
description: Inspired by Tove Jansson's Moominland Midwinter.
title: Explore a winter wonderland in Moomintroll: Winter's Warmth as you solve rescue animals in this cozy puzzle game

author: Issy van der Velde
description: A new perspective for the ancient tale.
title: Play as the infamous Minotaur of Greek mythology in Minos, an Orcs Must Die-like roguelite where you build a deadly labyrinth full of dastardly traps

author: Issy van der Velde
description: With voice actors from Final Fantasy, Game of Thrones, and Doctor Who, the performances in this sci-fi caper likely to be one of its strengths.
title: Earth Must Die looks like a sci-fi Monkey Island, with an extremely British cast that includes names from Taskmaster, Game of Thrones, and Doctor Who

author: Justin Wagner
description: Caleb lives again, again, for another time.
title: Nightdive's remaster of Blood is getting an overhaul with built-in mods in Blood: Refreshed Supply

author: Joe Donnelly
description: Restoring that first-play feel to a stone-cold classic.
title: A GTA map modder reinvented the 26-year-old classic GTA 2 with a seemingly simple but actually quite complicated trick

author: Tyler Wilde
description: Follow along here for live updates from the PC Gaming Show Tokyo Direct, including exclusive reveals and interviews from Tokyo Game Show.
title: PC Gaming Show Tokyo Direct live coverage – all the reveals and trailers as they happen

author: Rick Lane
description: Out now in early access.
title: Stario: Haven Tower is yet another vertical city-builder, but this one has magic, space whales and flying delivery turtles

author: Jacob Ridley
description: Pretty in pink (and assorted colours).
title: Hyte X50 PC case review

author: Mollie Taylor
description: Danganronpa 2's OST is one of my favourites.
title: A new Danganronpa game means one thing and one thing only: Getting to hear its excellent soundtrack all over again

author: Rick Lane
description: Assemble robots and build transport networks in this delightful blend of construction and puzzling.
title: 'Overwhelmingly positive' rover-building sim Mars First Logistics rolls out of early access with a new automation system and a 40% discount

author: Rick Lane
description: "We'll see what the franchise does in the future."
title: Senior Treyarch developer says he'd be 'dead lying' if he claimed not to be worried about series fatigue with Call of Duty: Black Ops 7

author: Jody Macgregor
description: Sidekick called T4NGO not confirmed.
title: The first DLC vault hunter in Borderlands 4 will be a robot cowboy gambler named C4SH who throws playing cards

author: Kerry Brunskill
description: Relax, you're about to win Wordle.
title: Today's Wordle clues, hints and answer for September 28 (#1562)

author: Jody Macgregor
description: Still classier than Funko Pops.
title: Magic: The Gathering cards featuring Dwight from The Office are a step too far for some, though others think they're 'so bad its circling back to being funny'
